traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firenewt makes two attacks with its scimitar.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spit Fire (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The firenewt spits fire at a creature within 10 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one
